document.full_text: nicolas batum scored over tony parker at the buzzer and the portland trail blazers edged the san antonio spurs 98-96 on friday night.
document.title: nicolas batum's buzzer-beater lifts blazers over spurs
lines_and_colors: nicolas batum scored over tony parker at the buzzer and the portland trail blazers edged the san antonio spurs 98-96 on friday night.
